background.agility and coordination: Through accidental clumsiness, the character caused a family member to be maimed.
background.beauty: Character has a strong chin, and also has a overlong torso with stumpy legs.
background.choices: A misspent youth cost the character 3 extra years to finish training.
background.family composition: Character raised by mother and father. Has no grandparents; brother who is 5 years younger.
background.relationships: Family members treat the character and his friends well, and look forward to news and visits. Brothers, sisters, and cousins will work as hirelings with a starting morale of 9.
background.robustness: Skin chafes easily: while armored, character will suffer 1 damage per two hours spent walking or riding.
background.tendencies: Character has a +3 bonus on Wisdom checks to avoid addiction.
